metadata.name: the_trench
metadata.description: On-chain rug registry with tiered token-gated access

instructions.name: accept_match
docs: Accept a PVP match as challenger

accounts.name: staked_position
docs: Optional staked position for tier check

accounts.name: fighter_stats
docs: Initialize fighter stats if first match

accounts.name: token_a_price_feed
docs: Pyth price feed for token A

accounts.name: token_b_price_feed
docs: Pyth price feed for token B

instructions.name: ban_reporter
docs: Ban a reporter for false reports

accounts.name: bid_account
docs: Create or update bidder's bid account

accounts.name: previous_bidder_sniper
docs: Previous highest bidder's token account (for refund)

accounts.name: staked_position
docs: Optional staked position for tier check

accounts.name: listing_vault
docs: Escrow vault holding the dead tokens

accounts.name: buyer_token_account
docs: Buyer's token account for the dead token

accounts.name: listing_vault
docs: Escrow vault holding the dead tokens

accounts.name: seller_token_account
docs: Seller's token account to return tokens to

instructions.name: check_access
docs: Check caller's access tier based on $SNIPER holdings

instructions.name: claim_signal_revenue
docs: Claim signal revenue as poster (70/15/15 split)

instructions.name: claim_tier_upgrade
docs: Claim tier upgrade after staking more

accounts.name: user_sniper
docs: User's $SNIPER token account (to check combined balance)

instructions.name: claim_winnings
docs: Claim winnings from a settled match

accounts.name: treasury_sniper
docs: Treasury token account for fee collection

instructions.name: clear_rug_entry
docs: Clear a rug entry (false positive remediation)

accounts.name: match_vault
docs: Match vault to hold escrowed bets

accounts.name: fighter_stats
docs: Initialize fighter stats if first match

accounts.name: staked_position
docs: Optional staked position for tier calculation

instructions.name: dispute_report
docs: Dispute a report as false positive

accounts.name: staked_position
docs: Optional staked position for tier calculation

instructions.name: expire_listing
docs: Expire a stale listing (anyone can call)

accounts.name: caller
docs: Anyone can call this to clean up expired listings

accounts.name: listing_vault
docs: Escrow vault holding the dead tokens

accounts.name: seller_token_account
docs: Seller's token account to return tokens to

accounts.name: expirer
docs: Anyone can call expire after timeout

accounts.name: winning_bid
docs: Winner's bid account (optional, only if there was a winner)

accounts.name: winning_flash_bid
docs: Winner's flash bid account (optional, if winner used flash bid)

accounts.name: previous_bidder_sniper
docs: Previous highest bidder's token account (for refund)

accounts.name: staked_position
docs: Optional staked position for tier check (no seeds constraint to avoid Option issues)

instructions.name: initialize
docs: Initialize the registry with authority and $SNIPER mint

accounts.name: seller_token_account
docs: Seller's token account for the dead token

accounts.name: listing_vault
docs: Escrow vault for the dead tokens

instructions.name: post_signal
docs: Post a new velocity signal (Warlord only)

accounts.name: poster_stats
docs: Initialize poster stats if first signal

accounts.name: staked_position
docs: Optional staked position for tier calculation

accounts.name: treasury_sniper
docs: Treasury token account to receive fees

accounts.name: staked_position
docs: Optional staked position for tier calculation

instructions.name: query_signal
docs: Query signal with tier-based access control

accounts.name: bid
docs: Querier's bid (optional, to check if auction winner)

accounts.name: querier_sniper
docs: Querier's $SNIPER token account for tier check

accounts.name: staked_position
docs: Optional staked position for tier check

instructions.name: query_wallet
docs: Query a single wallet's reputation (pays fee based on tier)

accounts.name: querier_sniper
docs: Querier's $SNIPER token account (for tier check + fee payment)

accounts.name: treasury_sniper
docs: Treasury token account to receive fees

accounts.name: staked_position
docs: Optional staked position for tier calculation

instructions.name: register_graveyard_participant
docs: Register as Graveyard participant (pay 100 $SNIPER entry fee)

instructions.name: report_trade_outcome
docs: Report trade outcome for flash bid (oracle only)

instructions.name: settle_flash_bid
docs: Settle flash bid based on trade outcome

accounts.name: bid_vault
docs: Signal bid vault (to pay the bid from)

instructions.name: settle_match
docs: Settle a match after end time

accounts.name: token_a_price_feed
docs: Pyth price feed for token A

accounts.name: token_b_price_feed
docs: Pyth price feed for token B

accounts.name: stake_vault
docs: Program's stake vault to hold staked tokens

accounts.name: target_wallet
docs: The wallet being reported as a rugger

accounts.name: staked_position
docs: Optional staked position for tier calculation

instructions.name: sweep_floor
docs: Sweep floor - buy multiple listings in one tx (max 10)

accounts.name: user_sniper
docs: User's $SNIPER token account to receive unstaked tokens

accounts.name: staked_position
docs: Optional staked position for tier calculation

errors.name: NotGrunt
errors.msg: User does not have Grunt tier access

errors.name: NotOperator
errors.msg: User does not have Operator tier access

errors.name: NotWarlord
errors.msg: User does not have Warlord tier access

errors.name: ReporterBanned
errors.msg: Reporter is banned from submitting reports

errors.name: InvalidReportIndex
errors.msg: Report index does not match expected value

errors.name: AlreadyValidated
errors.msg: Report has already been validated by this user

errors.name: NoRugEntry
errors.msg: Wallet has no rug entry to query

errors.name: StakeTooLow
errors.msg: Stake amount too low for any tier

errors.name: MatchNotOpen
errors.msg: Match is not in Open status

errors.name: MatchNotActive
errors.msg: Match is not in Active status

errors.name: MatchNotEnded
errors.msg: Match has not reached end time yet

errors.name: NotParticipant
errors.msg: Not a participant in this match

errors.name: MatchNotExpired
errors.msg: Match has not expired yet (24h timeout)

errors.name: StalePriceFeed
errors.msg: Price feed is stale (>60 seconds old)

errors.name: SameToken
errors.msg: Token A and Token B cannot be the same

errors.name: BidNotHighEnough
errors.msg: Bid must exceed current highest bid

errors.name: HashMismatch
errors.msg: Hash does not match revealed contract address

errors.name: SignalNotRevealing
errors.msg: Signal is not in Revealing status

errors.name: SignalNotRevealedYet
errors.msg: Access denied - signal not yet revealed for your tier

errors.name: FlashBidAlreadySettled
errors.msg: Flash bid has already been settled

errors.name: FlashBidNotWon
errors.msg: Flash bid is not in Won status

errors.name: FlashBidBlacklisted
errors.msg: Bidder is blacklisted from flash loans

errors.name: ZeroTokenAmount
errors.msg: Token amount must be greater than zero

fields.name: is_winner
docs: Whether this bid won the auction

types.name: DeadTokenListing
docs: A listing of dead tokens for sale

types.name: EvidenceType
docs: Types of evidence for rug reports

fields.name: total_coup_de_grace_bonus
docs: Total Coup de Grace bonus earned

types.name: FlashBid
docs: Flash loan bid - bid with future trade proceeds

fields.name: signal
docs: Signal this flash bid is for

fields.name: interest_rate_bps
docs: Interest rate at time of bid (basis points)

fields.name: trade_pnl
docs: Trade P&L reported by oracle (scaled 1e6, can be negative)

fields.name: liquidation_count
docs: Number of liquidations that led to blacklist

fields.name: listing_duration_secs
docs: Listing duration in seconds (30 days default)

types.name: GraveyardParticipant
docs: Graveyard participant (pays entry fee to access)

fields.name: min_bet_amount
docs: Minimum bet amount in $SNIPER base units

fields.name: max_bet_amount
docs: Maximum bet amount in $SNIPER base units

fields.name: min_duration_secs
docs: Minimum match duration in seconds (300 = 5 min)

fields.name: max_duration_secs
docs: Maximum match duration in seconds (86400 = 24 hours)

fields.name: settlement_grace_period
docs: Grace period for settlement after match ends (seconds)

fields.name: coup_de_grace_threshold_bps
docs: Coup de Grace threshold in basis points (1000 = 10%)

fields.name: coup_de_grace_bonus_bps
docs: Coup de Grace bonus in basis points (100 = 1%)

types.name: Match
docs: PVP Match for token performance duels

fields.name: token_a_start_price
docs: Token A price at match start

fields.name: token_b_start_price
docs: Token B price at match start

fields.name: token_a_end_price
docs: Token A price at match end

fields.name: token_b_end_price
docs: Token B price at match end

fields.name: token_a_pct_change
docs: Token A percentage change (scaled by 100, so 1500 = 15.00%)

fields.name: coup_de_grace
docs: True if winner won by >10% gap (domination)

fields.name: coup_de_grace_bonus
docs: Bonus amount from house fee for domination wins

fields.name: authority
docs: Program authority (can update config, ban reporters)

fields.name: treasury
docs: Treasury wallet for fee collection (50% of fees)

fields.name: grunt_single_fee
docs: Single query fee for Grunt tier

fields.name: operator_single_fee
docs: Single query fee for Operator tier

types.name: ReporterProfile
docs: Profile tracking a reporter's history and credibility

fields.name: validated_reports
docs: Reports that were validated by others

fields.name: banned_at
docs: When the reporter was banned (0 if not banned)

fields.name: validations_given
docs: Total validations given to other reports

fields.name: rug_count
docs: Number of confirmed hard rugs (LP pull, honeypot)

fields.name: soft_rug_count
docs: Number of soft rugs (abandonment, slow rug)

fields.name: total_reports
docs: Total reports filed against this wallet

fields.name: confidence
docs: Confidence level (0-100) based on report count

fields.name: first_reported
docs: First time this wallet was reported

fields.name: last_rug_timestamp
docs: Timestamp of most recent confirmed rug

fields.name: last_reporter
docs: Last reporter who submitted against this wallet

types.name: RugReport
docs: A single rug report submitted by a warlord

fields.name: report_index
docs: Report index for this reporter/target combination

fields.name: evidence_type
docs: Type of evidence for the rug

fields.name: token_ca
docs: Optional token contract address for context

fields.name: validation_count
docs: Number of validations from other warlords

fields.name: validators
docs: Wallets that have validated this report

fields.name: auction_winner_reveal_time
docs: When auction winner can see (posted_at + 0, after winning)

fields.name: revenue_claimed
docs: Whether revenue has been claimed by poster

fields.name: successful_signals
docs: Signals that led to profitable trades

types.name: StakedPosition
docs: A user's staked $SNIPER position for permanent tier access

fields.name: tier
docs: Current tier based on staked amount

fields.name: lock_until
docs: Lock period end timestamp (0 = no lock)

fields.name: last_modified
docs: Last time the position was modified

fields.name: total_queries
docs: Total queries made with this position

fields.name: total_fees_paid
docs: Total fees paid (only applies to Grunt/Operator)

fields.name: oracle
docs: Oracle signer for trade outcome reports (Rico's executor)

fields.name: min_bid
docs: Minimum bid amount in $SNIPER base units

fields.name: auction_duration
docs: Auction duration in seconds (5 default for fast signals)

fields.name: min_collateral_ratio_bps
docs: Minimum collateral ratio in basis points (2000 = 20%)

fields.name: flash_interest_rate_bps
docs: Flash bid interest rate in basis points (1000 = 10%)

fields.name: flash_blacklist_duration
docs: Flash bid blacklist duration in seconds (86400 = 24h)
